About us

We are a vegan café in the heart of Vilnius. Our food is down-to-earth and simple - people who visit us often say they feel like they're visiting their grandmother. We want you to feel like you're visiting us, not just a café. The main rule here is respect for each other, no matter what your role in the place

We respect not only people, but also nature. The place is one of the oldest vegetarian cafés in Vilnius and became vegan in 2022. We care deeply about nature and the life in it, which is why we sort, choose only ethical products, minimise food waste, encourage people to bring their own takeaway containers, etc.

Our white café walls are decorated with art, so we decided to host exhibitions on site. These are mostly works by emerging artists (photography, painting, graphics, etc.), but we also had an exhibition by the famous Lithuanian painter Aloyzas Stasiulevičius. So if you would like to have your own exhibition with us, get in touch !
